title: Flame Scroll Drop
lore: From the ashes of forgotten scrolls, the Flame Seal burns with a timeless vow — to ignite wisdom wherever shadows fall. Each bearer is entrusted with fire not merely to warm, but to awaken.

assets.label: XO Flame Seal
